ygData.subject: Greetings fellow wordsmiths!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and well met all! I hope to find this forum as interesting and informative as I have heard tell it to be in my travels. I am Kitasi, the mournful bard of
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and well met all!

I hope to find this forum as interesting and informative as I have
heard tell it to be in my travels.

I am Kitasi, the mournful bard of Faydwyr on E'ci. Why mournful you
may ask? Because I have dedicated much of my time to a seemingly fruitless
pursuit of the arch-fiend Crookstinger, a demon in wasp form, for what other
natural creature would take a name unto itself and launch itself at others
willy-nilly!

I am dedicated to the pursuit of all things Crooky and make it a
point to always spend several days hunting the vile creature whenever I am
on Faydwyr, the land of my birth. I would greatly appreciate any and all
information the assembled group of loremasters might be able to provide me
on this clever foe.

Until then, May Errolissi hold you in her arms always!

Kitasi
The mournful bard of Faydwer on E'ci
"and no one shall work for money,
and no one shall work for fame"
"but each for the joy of the working,
and each to his seperate star..."
